FunctionName.title: Function Name
FunctionName.description: The name of the Lambda function

FunctionArn.title: Function ARN
FunctionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function

Runtime.title: Runtime
Runtime.description: The runtime environment for the Lambda function

MemorySize.title: Memory Size
MemorySize.description: The amount of memory available to the function in MB

Timeout.title: Timeout
Timeout.description: The function execution time limit in seconds

State.title: State
State.description: The current state of the function

LastModified.title: Last Modified
LastModified.description: The date and time the function was last modified

CodeSha256.title: Code SHA256
CodeSha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the function's deployment package

CodeSize.title: Code Size
CodeSize.description: The size of the function's deployment package in bytes

LastUpdateStatus.title: Last Update Status
LastUpdateStatus.description: The status of the last update that was performed on the function

LastUpdateStatusReason.title: Last Update Status Reason
LastUpdateStatusReason.description: The reason for the last update that was performed on the function

LastUpdateStatusReasonCode.title: Last Update Status Reason Code
LastUpdateStatusReasonCode.description: The reason code for the last update that was performed on the function

Version.title: Version
Version.description: The version of the Lambda function

RevisionId.title: Revision ID
RevisionId.description: The revision ID of the function

MasterArn.title: Master ARN
MasterArn.description: The ARN of the master function

SigningJobArn.title: Signing Job ARN
SigningJobArn.description: The ARN of the signing job

SigningProfileVersionArn.title: Signing Profile Version ARN
SigningProfileVersionArn.description: The ARN of the signing profile version

StateReason.title: State Reason
StateReason.description: The reason for the function's current state

StateReasonCode.title: State Reason Code
StateReasonCode.description: The reason code for the function's current state

Environment.title: Environment
Environment.description: The environment variables for the function

VpcConfig.title: VPC Config
VpcConfig.description: The VPC configuration for the function

TracingConfig.title: Tracing Config
TracingConfig.description: The tracing configuration for the function

LoggingConfig.title: Logging Config
LoggingConfig.description: The logging configuration for the function

EphemeralStorage.title: Ephemeral Storage
EphemeralStorage.description: The ephemeral storage configuration for the function

ImageConfigResponse.title: Image Config Response
ImageConfigResponse.description: The image configuration response for the function

RuntimeVersionConfig.title: Runtime Version Config
RuntimeVersionConfig.description: The runtime version configuration for the function

SnapStart.title: Snap Start
SnapStart.description: The SnapStart configuration for the function

Architectures.title: Architectures
Architectures.description: The architectures supported by the function

FileSystemConfigs.title: File System Configs
FileSystemConfigs.description: The file system configurations for the function

Tags.title: Tags
Tags.description: The tags associated with the function

KmsKeyArn.title: KMS Key ARN
KmsKeyArn.description: The KMS key ARN for encryption
